# TranslationSession.BatchResponse

**Structure**

A type that provides asynchronous access to translation responses.

## Declaration

```swift
struct BatchResponse
```

## Overview

This type returns instances of [doc://com.apple.Translation/documentation/Translation/TranslationSession/Response] asynchronously and throws an `Error` if something goes wrong.

## Structures

- **TranslationSession.BatchResponse.AsyncIterator**: The type of asynchronous iterator that produces elements of this asynchronous sequence.

## Instance Methods

- **makeAsyncIterator()**: Creates the asynchronous iterator that produces elements of this asynchronous sequence.

## Type Aliases

- **TranslationSession.BatchResponse.Element**: The type of element produced by this asynchronous sequence.

## Translating the text

- **translate(_:)**: Translates a single string of text.
- **translate(batch:)**: Translates multiple strings of text of the same language, returning a sequence of responses as they’re available.
- **translations(from:)**: Translates multiple strings of text of the same language, returning the results all at once when complete.
- **TranslationSession.Request**: A translation request containing a single item of text to translate.
- **TranslationSession.Response**: The response to a translation request.

## Conforms To

- AsyncSequence
